messages.subject: NTHK, NY Token Kai Shinsa 2006
messages.msgSnippet: The New York Token Kai will be hosting a Nihon Token Hozon Kai shinsa for swords and fittings at the downtown Jersey City, NJ Doubletree hotel this September 1
messages.messageBody:
The New York Token Kai will be hosting a Nihon Token Hozon Kai shinsa for swords and fittings at the downtown Jersey City, NJ Doubletree hotel this September 1 through 3. This is the same location as the previous shinsa, but we will also be hosting a sword show this time.

Please see the shinsa website for details:

http://www.ny-tokenkai.org/shinsa.htm

http://www.ny-tokenkai.org/taikai.htm

Please feel free to cross post this information.

Regards,

Jim Gilbert

President, NY Token Kai

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
